Notes:
• More accurate location mapping
• Faster image loading
• Faster launch time
• Bug fixes

• Improved ability to copy and paste text
• Added links to phone numbers and addresses
• Fixed issue that sometimes caused the app to crash

• Ability to see who's online and who's mobile
• Ability to see when the other person is typing
• A faster way to compose new messages to the people you message most
• Various performance improvements
• Support for 12 additional languages
• Support for iOS 5
- Bug fixes

• Faster message scrolling
• Faster startup
• Fix "blue screen" startup crash
• Retina display photos for friend chooser
• Bug fixes

• Fix startup crash introduced in 1.5.2 upgrade.
• Bug fixes.

• Faster way to start conversations
• Easier way to start group conversations
• 10 new languages: čeština, dansk, Nederlands, Ελληνικά, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, ‪norsk (bokmål), polski, português (Portugal), ไทย
• Bug fixes

Now it’s even easier to reach groups of friends on the go:
• Text friends for free, using your existing data plan
• Reach friends wherever they are now – on their phone or the web
• Know who’s seen your message, and who hasn’t 
• See where friends are messaging you from

Also includes:
• Typing indicator – see when your friend is replying
• Bug fixes

Now with more great ways to stay in touch on the go:

- Quickly switch between multiple conversations with in-app notifications
- Include friends of friends in conversations
- Swipe to delete individual messages from conversations
- See who's available when you start a new conversation
- Share bigger photos, tap for full screen and pinch to zoom

More improvements:
- Faster app loading, navigating and sending
- More-reliable push notifications
- Bug fixes

Changes in 1.8.1:
- Fix bug causing friends and profile photos to load slowly
- See more top friends in the compose view

Changes from 1.8:

Now with more great ways to stay in touch on the go:

- Quickly switch between multiple conversations with in-app notifications
- Include friends of friends in conversations

New features include:
· Add smileys, hearts and other emoji to messages
· Tap the person's name at the top of your conversation to view their Facebook Timeline
· Seeing who's active lets you and your friends know how soon to expect a reply
· Improved "new message" sound
· Other bug fixes

New in 1.9.1:
· Fixed a startup crash on iOS 4.0 and 4.1

What's New in Version 2.1
- Send a quick voice message when you have more to say
- Call friends for free right from Messenger*

What's New in Version 2.1
- Send a quick voice message when you have more to say
- Call friends for free right from Messenger*
- Other improvements and bug fixes

What’s New in Version 2.1.1

What's New in Version 2.3

Updates to group conversations
- Name a group right from the top of your conversation
- Get to your group conversations in one tap – just swipe left to see them in your sidebar
- Search for group conversations by name or look them up by friends in the group
- Other improvements and bug fixes

What's New in Version 2.3.1

Updates to group conversations
- Name a group right from the top of your conversation
- Get to your group conversations in one tap – just swipe left to see them in your sidebar
- Search for group conversations by name or look them up by friends in the group
- Other improvements and bug fixes

Bring your messages to life with stickers:
- Just tap the smiley to add a playful kitten or another cute critter
- Send any sticker with one tap
- For more sticker options, tap the basket

Other new features include:
- Delete conversations from your inbox just by swiping (back by popular request)
- Bug fixes

Stickers will be available to everyone over the next few weeks.

Bring your messages to life with stickers:

Now it's easier to send photos and emoji:
- Just tap the paper clip from any message
- Choose photos from Instagram and any other album on your phone

Don't forget about stickers: Tap the smiley to see what's new in the sticker store.

Bug fixes

- Available in more languages: Croatian, Hungarian and Slovakian
- Plus, improved scrolling and overall performance

Free Calls: Talk as long as you want and stay in touch wherever you are. (Calls are free over Wi-Fi. Otherwise, standard data charges apply).

Groups: Now you can create groups for the people you message most. Name them, set group photos and keep them all in one place

Free Calls: Talk as long as you want and stay in touch wherever you are. (Calls are free over Wi-Fi. Otherwise, standard data charges apply.)

More ways to message: Everything's front and center, so it's easier to send photos, voice messages and more.

Video: Send videos from your phone's camera roll and when people send you videos, play them right in the app.

Instant photo sharing: Take a photo and send it in just one tap, without leaving the conversation. 

Shortcuts to stickers: When someone sends you a sticker, press and hold down on it to get the pack. 

Improved search: Enter the names of people and groups to find them quickly.

Other fixes, including to stickers and groups.

More ways to message: Everything's front and center, so it's easier to send photos, voice messages and more. 

Video: Send videos from your phone's camera roll and when people send you videos, play them right in the app. 

Instant photo sharing: Take a photo and send it in just one tap, without leaving the conversation. 

Shortcuts to stickers: When someone sends you a sticker, press and hold down on it to get the pack. 

Improved search: Enter the names of people and groups to find them quickly. 

Other fixes, including to stickers and groups.

Instant Video Sending: Shoot and play 15-second video messages from the camera right in the app

Big Likes: Press and hold to send an even bigger thumbs up when you really, really like something.

Fixed issues so that the list of people active on Facebook shows up faster.
